sources.title: Toll of the Desert
sources.description: An old-fashioned western. Don't bother downloading the h.264 file; the Cinepack file from which it is derived is smaller.

sources.title: Toll of the Desert (1935) FRED KOHLER, JR
sources.description:
Stars: Fred Kohler Jr., Betty Mack, Roger Williams 
Director: William Berke 

When his family is killed by Indians, a bitter cowboy turns into a ruthless hired gunman. Unbeknownst to him, his son had survived the attack, and is now a lawman. The son, not knowing that the killer is his father, is assigned to bring him to justice!

metadata.Plot: When his family is killed by Indians, a bitter cowboy turns into a ruthless hired gunman. Unbeknownst to him, his son had survived the attack, and is now a lawman. The son, not knowing that the killer is his father, is assigned to bring him to justice.
metadata.Actors: Fred Kohler Jr., Betty Mack, Roger Williams
